mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, content, post_date, member_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{postDate}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.title, n.content, DATE_FORMAT(n.post_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS post_date, n.member_id, m.username FROM notice n LEFT JOIN member m ON n.member_id = m.id WHERE n.id = #{noticeId}

SELECT n.id, n.title, n.content, DATE_FORMAT(n.post_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS post_date, n.member_id, m.username FROM notice n LEFT JOIN member m ON n.member_id = m.id WHERE 1=1
AND n.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.title}, '%')
AND m.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.username}, '%')
